{{Infobox battle item
|name       = Sharp Beak
|image      = [[File:Sharp Beak.png|100px]]
|caption    = In game image of the ''Sharp Beak''
|location   = [[Dungeons]]
}}

==Description==
The '''Sharp Beak''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to [[File:Flying_Type_icon.png|30px]]Flying type Pokémon.

==Details==
Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 10%.

==Acquistion==

{{Loot/head‎|Battle items}}
{{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary|N/A}}
{{LootItem|Sky Pillar|Legendary|N/A}}
{{LootItem|Pledge Grove|Legendary|N/A}}
{{LootItem|Ten Carat Hill|Legendary|N/A}}
|}
|}
